name: The Hole (itch) (munij)
description:
Developed for the Black And White Game Jam 11 hosted by MYLine Media, "The Hole" is a short platforming game that will test your use of momentum by making use of a "hole" for traversing the level.

Place holes in flat surfaces, and jump into the abyss in order to progress through the stage, avoiding dangerous obstacles as you scale through it.

Make sure to play the game in fullscreen mode (By pressing the blue "extend" button on the bottom right of the screen) in order to get a full view of the level.

NOTE: the game is still in development, and wil continue to be updated after the jam's results.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left Mouse Click for placing holes

Spacebar for jumping
